attributes.action: Remove the border between Unionist Northern Ireland and Unionist Great Britain.
attributes.additional_details: We are the UNITED KINGDOM of GREAT BRITAIN and NORTHERN IRELAND! The border down the Irish Sea is a betrayal of the UNION to both NORTHERN IRELAND and GREAT BRITAIN. Reverse this betrayal and reunite the UNITED KINGDOM 🇬🇧
attributes.background: As stated above, remove the border between Unionist Northern Ireland and Unionist Great Britain. After all, we are the UNITED KINGDOM of Great Britain AND Northern Ireland! Northern Ireland and Great Britain have been betrayed by this current UK/EU Treaty!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petition:

Trigger Article 16. We want unfettered GB-NI Trade.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573209
